ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class ClaimListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.ClaimListController

  • public class ClaimListController
extends Object
    The controller allowing modifications from the ui to change the claims and claims lists Allows general functionality like adding/deleting claims

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      ClaimListController(ClaimList claimList)
      Gets the current claims list
